section.title: Description
section.p: ABORT rolls back the current transaction and causes all the updates made by the transaction to be discarded. This command is identical in behavior to the standard SQL command , and is present only for historical reasons.

plentry.pd: Optional key words. They have no effect.

section.title: Notes
section.p: Use COMMIT to successfully terminate a transaction.
Issuing ABORT when not inside a transaction does no harm, but it will provoke a warning message.

section.title: Compatibility
section.p: This command is a Greenplum Database extension present for historical reasons. ROLLBACK is the equivalent standard SQL command.
